name: Slack Day
shortDescription: A simple, lighthearted arcade game focused on stress management, where you try to maintain your health bar by avoiding stressful objects.
fullDescription:
Slack Day is a casual game that models stress management, challenging players to see if they are 'A True Slacker?'. The core mechanic revolves around a 'Health' bar that directly reflects the player's stress level: 'Higher The stress, Lower Your Health'.

Key Features:

  • Stress Management Goal: The main objective is to 'Avoid being stressed by letting go off the stressful Objects'.
  • Health Bar Mechanic: The 'Health' bar tracks your stress level in real-time.
  • Strategic Movement: Simple actions like jumping ('Tap to Jump') are risky, as they can 'decrease Your Health', adding a layer of strategy to basic movement.
  • Lighthearted Theme: A casual and fun approach to the concept of avoiding stress.
